duties_responsibilities.duty: Design and execute all initiatives across lending and financial products for SME clients, from early pilots to scaling in the marketplace.
Create long-term product plans, focusing on customers, competition, profitability, product life cycle, and service considerations.
Create and optimize lending product portfolio by analyzing SME needs and partnering with direct lenders.
Own the overall lending and financial product standardization efforts, requiring coordination with technology, legal, sales, and marketing.
Apply analytical and creative thinking to design solutions to operational inefficiencies, risks, and opportunities, and manage the implementation of the solutions.
Lead requirement gathering sessions; design, ideate, wireframe, prototype features, and experiences.
Assist technology implementations wherever additional guidance or resourcing is needed, such as requirements documentation, solution design, UAT, and user support.
Ensure effective communication and escalation on overall program status, implementation plans, management issues, priorities, and risks.
Analyze the current end-to-end processes and key performance indicators across lending and financial products; identify opportunities to leverage best practices.
Continuously seek out new technologies to improve inefficiencies, customer experience, and scalability.
Understand the customer journey and develop recommendations for products and product enhancements based on a thorough understanding of user personas and use case scenarios.

Pull from market and competitive insights, customer needs, and internal business priorities to create the product vision (target customer segments, markets, channels, go-to-market approach, and value propositions).
Collaborate with internal teams to ensure successful launch and ongoing management of products.
Partner with sales to create a uniform understanding across the company of the product design and value propositions; ensure staff are equipped with the necessary product knowledge and sales tools.
Collaborate with partner management and marketing to develop and execute tailored strategies to drive growth and engagement across the product suite.
Develop, implement & monitor performance metrics to ensure the quality and efficiency in implementing the initiatives.
Conduct regular competitive analysis to identify trends and opportunities for product improvement and/or additions.

education_certification.credential: Bachelor's degree in Finance, Business, or a related field (Master's preferred)
